pages.text: Ars Nouveau is now in 1.0! This is a major version change with an impact on progression and existing items. $(li)Arcane Ore has become much more rare. $(li)Arcane Bricks are no longer used and may be converted into the new materials. Mana Gems and Arcane Stone will replace it. $(li) Added the Crystallizer, a way to renewably obtain Mana Gems.

$(li) Most recipes have been changed. $(li) Additional decorative blocks have been added to the Stonecutter. $(li) Added the Delay spell. $(li) Spells may now use the same effect multiple times. $(li) Leap now uses your Y-look vector. $(br) There is still tons of content in the works including additional mana generation, curios and equipment, new entities, and enemies with unique spell rewards!
